entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 10:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h except 60 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 near midnight then becoming northwest 20. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
